entry.title: 100% Egyptian Cotton, 540 Thread Count 2 Pack Striped Standard Size Pillowcases - 4 Colors with Wrinkle Guard to Choose from - fits 20x26 (Color: Ivory)
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 18.51 - 18.60 (2 variants)

In response to repeated requests from its Amazon customers, American Pillowcase proudly introduces a high-quality, luxuriously soft set of linens that are RELAXATION READY the moment they come out of the dryer. No detail was overlooked in the careful crafting of these 540 thread count striped linens. The 100% EGYPTIAN COTTON fabric is woven using fine yarns, so although it is a high thread count, it is medium weight and perfect for use on warm or cool nights. 100% cotton fibers are ideal for those with sensitive skin as well as comfort and breath-ability. The fabric is expertly finished to ensure its SILKY SOFTNESS, LUSTROUS SHEEN, and WRINKLE RESISTANCE. We have added more stitches to the hems than any other competitor, ensuring the hems never fall apart. The hypoallergenic qualities will reduce allergens but still showcases a smooth finish for a satin-like surface and luminous sheen.

Package Includes: Two standard pillowcases - 21" x 32" - Fits a standard-sized 20” x 26” pillow

Luxury Striped Linens

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with this American Pillowcase silky weave linen set. These items use proprietary processing to limit wrinkling out of the dryer to make this product perfect for any bed in your home.

High Thread Count Egyption Cotton

Our authentic 540 thread count cotton linens are produced using long staple yarns that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability.
Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 540 are known for a ultra soft, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture. Cotton sheets resist pilling, especially in thread counts of 400 or more. These sheets will develop a softer feel with every washing.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton sheets in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. Gently wash with warm water and a standard detergent. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens.
Removing cotton sheets promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove sheets while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton sheets. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.
  • 100% Egyptian Cotton - Luxuriously-long Staple Cotton Yarns Make These Pillowcases Incredibly Soft and Durable
  • MEASUREMENTS: STANDARD PILLOWCASES - 21" x 32" - Fits a standard-sized 20” x 26” pillow. Confirm pillow size before ordering. Set of 2 pillowcases included. Bag closure.
  • A SUMPTUOUS SLEEPING EXPERIENCE THAT WON’T BREAK THE BANK - tested better than all major brands for softness, durability, comfort, wrinkle resistance, and beauty at 50% less than department store prices
  • WRINKLE RESISTANT - Eco-friendly proprietary processing to limit wrinkling out of the dryer make this product perfect for any bed in your home
  • EASY CARE & PRESHRUNK FOR A PERFECT FIT - Machine wash on cold. Tumble dry on low. Do not use bleach or softeners. Preshrunk for a perfectly snug fit on your pillow.
  • MATCHING DUVET COVER AND SHEETS SOLD SEPARATELY - Purchase a matching duvet cover with your pillowcases for a significant discount! See details below under Special Offers and Product Promotions, or click on the Sold by American Pillowcase link below.

s:variant.title: Ivory - Striped / King
s:variant.s:sku: T540 Stripe Pillowcases 2 pk Ivory K

s:variant.title: Lt. Blue - Striped / King
s:variant.s:sku: T540 Stripe Pillowcases 2 pk Lt Blue - K

entry.title: American Pillowcase Egyptian Cotton Hemstitch Dinner Napkins - Pick Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type: Home
Price: 36.93 - 975.00 (2 variants)

These are beautiful, 100% long staple Egyptian cotton napkins. Perfect for elegant dinner parties or everyday use. These are sold to hotels and restaurants throughout the world and are made to withstand many washings in a commercial laundry, so they should last a long time in your home. Great for all weddings and dinner parties. In most cases these are more affordable than renting.

Hemstitch Dinner Napkins 20"x 20"

Own these superior quality cotton napkins for less than you can rent them. Our elegant napkins are a perfect addition to your dinner service. Choose from Hemstitch or Satin Band knowing you’re getting beautiful, durable, long lasting napkins.

Beautiful Egyptian Cotton

The beautiful Egyptian cotton used in these napkins will ensure lasting beauty and quality. These napkins come slightly starched from the factory, this allows them to be cut and sewn perfectly. We recommend they be washed before being used. They will continually get softer with every wash.

Care Instructions

When its time to wash your napkins simply toss them in your washer on a cold setting with a detergent of your choice.

Machine dry on medium heat. Remove your napkins when they are 95% dry and iron slightly for a beautiful crisp finish.
  • 100% COTTON – Nearly all napkins selling online are polyester. These will get softer over time
  • ELEGANT – Beautiful hemstitched, mitered corners, and a linen look will add class to your table
  • AFFORDABLE – Buying is less expensive than renting just once for an event
  • PRE-SHUNK - 20"x20". Unlike most napkins, these are pre-shrunk and will remain square

entry.title: American Pillowcase 2 Body Pillowcase Set, 100% Cotton, 300 Thread Count, 21x60 Pillow Cover, Fits 20 x 54, White
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type: Kitchen
Price: 27.95

One of the top selling products in the category on Amazon for over 4 years! 100% Long Staple Cotton is breathable to keep you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. 300 Thread Count is perfect for maximum comfort and durability. This is the exact fabric I sold to 5 star, luxury hotels for years. Higher thread count does not mean better quality or comfort. No Zipper to scratch your face or feet. Hypoallergenic, will reduce allergens. Sateen Finish for a smooth surface and luminous sheen. Double Stitched Seams for quality and durability. 21 x 60 inches perfectly covers your 20 x 54 pillow with enough overhang to not see the pillow or tuck back into the pillow for a clean look.

Includes: 2 Body Pillowcases (21"x60" fits 20x54" pillow) with 4” hem

Body Pillowcase

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with this American Pillowcase Body Pillowcase. These pillowcases are made of 100% Egyptian cotton with a breathable, soft sateen weave comparable to those found in 5 star hotels around the globe.

300 Thread Count Egyptian Cotton

Our 300 thread count Egyptian cotton is made with a sateen four over one weave allowing for a silky soft feel. These pillowcases feel smooth and fresh providing the comfort you need for quality nights rest.

Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 200-400 are known for a soft, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton sheets in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. A normal wash cycle with a warm temperature setting is recommended. Quality, pH balanced detergents are best when washing fine cotton linens. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens. Removing cotton sheets promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove sheets while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton sheets. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.
  • RICH COLORS / BRIGHT WHITE– Machine wash in cold/medium temperature water and do not use bleach to limit fading.
  • 300 THREAD COUNT - Perfect for maximum comfort and durability. Higher thread count does not mean better quality or comfort.
  • DETAILS MATTER - 4" Hems add beauty. Oversized pillowcase keeps pillow out of view. Double stitching adds durability. Fine cotton adds breathability and softness. These cannot be sold cheaper without sacrificing on the quality.
  • 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If not completely satisfied, return with no-questions asked.
  • MATCHING FLAT AND FITTED SHEETS AND SHAMS – Click on the “Sold by American Pillowcase” link above to find matching sheets and shams as well as entire range of bedding and bath products.

entry.title: Polycotton Pillowcases, Bulk Pack, White, 200 Thread Count, Perfect for Physical Therapy Clinics, Hotels, Camps …
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 23.99 - 77.98 (4 variants)

These are great for hotels, AirBnB, camps, crafts, physical therapy clinics, embroidery. Please check your pillow size to make sure you order the correct size. American Pillowcase Body Pillow Cover 100% Percale Cotton American Pillowcase is bringing you its polycotton two-pack of body pillowcases. This textile is a classic one-over-one-under weave which makes the fabric cool and crisp to touch. This breathable yet medium weight material keeps you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. High thread count does not mean better quality or comfort, but this 200 count is perfect for maximum durability and comfort. Hotel quality, made of 60% cotton 40% polyester for cotton-rich comfort. Durable quality Luxurious 200 Thread Count Percale Poly Cotton Durable quality Luxurious 200 Thread Count Percale Poly Cotton 200 Thread Count Percale Poly Cotton Our percale weave cotton pillowcases are produced using a one over one under pattern, creating a tight weave that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability. These are great if you want less wrinkling than cotton. It you want to print or tie dye them, 100% cotton works better, but these work as well.

entry.title: 100% Cotton White T220 Percale Wholesale Bulk Pillowcases for Tie-Dying, Silk Screening, Hotels, Crafts, Camps, Parties, Physical Therapy - Pick Size
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 11.68 - 365.65 (6 variants)

American Pillowcase is bringing you its 100% luxury Egyptian Cotton made from long staple yarns. This Percale textile is a classic one-over-one-under weave which makes the fabric cool and crisp to touch. This breathable yet medium weight material keeps you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. High thread count does not mean better quality or comfort, but this 220 count is perfect for maximum comfort and durability. Even for those with sensitive skin. The hypoallergenic qualities will reduce allergens but still showcases a smooth finish for a satin-like surface and luminous sheen. The hems will help prevent falling apart as extra stitches have been added to ensure a long-lasting product. Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with these American Pillowcase pillowcases. These pillowcases are made of 100% Egyptian cotton with a breathable, crisp Percale weave comparable to those found in 5 star hotels around the globe. 220 Thread Count Percale Egyption Cotton Our percale weave cotton pillowcases are produced using a one over one under pattern, creating a tight weave that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability. Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 200-400 are known for a crisp, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture. Percale linens resist pilling. These linens will develop a softer feel with every washing. Care Instructions You should always wash your cotton percale pillowcases in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. A gentle wash cycle with a cold temperature setting, and a mild detergent is recommended. Quality, pH balanced detergents are best when washing fine cotton linens. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens. Removing cotton pillowcases promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove pillowcases while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton pillowcases. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.

The fabric is expertly finished to ensure its SILKY SOFTNESS, LUSTROUS SHEEN, and WRINKLE RESISTANCE. We have added more stitches to the hems than any other competitor, ensuring the hems never fall apart. The hypoallergenic qualities will reduce allergens but still showcases a smooth finish for a satin-like surface and luminous sheen.

California King Includes: One Deep Pocket Fitted Sheet (72" x 84" fits mattresses up to 18") with all-around elastic

Luxury Striped Sheet Set

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with this American Pillowcase silky weave sheet set. These sheets use proprietary processing to limit wrinkling out of the dryer to make this product perfect for any bed in your home.

High Thread Count Egyption Cotton

Our authentic 540 thread count cotton sheets are produced using long staple yarns that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability.
Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 540 are known for a ultra soft, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture. Cotton sheets resist pilling, especially in thread counts of 400 or more. These sheets will develop a softer feel with every washing.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton sheets in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. Gently wash with warm water and a standard detergent. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens.
Removing cotton sheets promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove sheets while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton sheets. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.
  • 100% Egyptian Cotton 540 Thread Count – Hypoallergenic, Long Staple Yarns Woven is a Sateen Weave Make These Sheets Incredibly Soft and Luxurious
  • MEASUREMENTS: FITTED SHEET - 72" x 84" - Fits California King size bed, deep pockets to ensure easily installation without the worry of them slipping up
  • A SUMPTUOUS SLEEPING EXPERIENCE THAT WON'T BREAK THE BANK - tested better than all major brands for softness, durability, comfort, wrinkle resistance, and beauty at 50% less than department store prices
  • WRINKLE RESISTANT - Eco-friendly, proprietary processing to limit wrinkling out of the dryer make this product perfect for any bed in your home
  • MATCHING SHAMS AND DUVET COVERS SOLD SEPARATELY - Click on the "Sold by American Pillowcase" link below to find matching shams and sheet sets. Purchase matching shams with your duvet cover for a significant discount! See details below
  • MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If you don't love your new American Pillowcase fitted sheet return it for a full refund with our 30 day, no-questions-asked guarantee

entry.title: American Pillowcase Shams, Luxury 100% Egyptian Cotton - Pick Size and Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 14.97 - 25.99 (14 variants)

I really like the look of shams on my pillows much more than pillowcases, but it is very difficult to find high quality, luxury cotton shams without paying a fortune. For years, I made these shams for some of the finest hotels in the world and guests would call to ask if I would sell them. Now I do!

100% Long Staple Cotton is breathable to keep you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. 300 Thread Count is perfect for maximum comfort and durability. This is the exact fabric I sold to 5 star, luxury hotels for years. Higher thread count does not mean better quality or comfort. Hypoallergenic, will reduce allergens. Sateen Finish for a smooth surface and luminous sheen. Double Stitched Seams for quality and durability.

Includes: 2 Standard Shams 21" x 26"

Standard Sham

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with these American Pillowcase Pillow Shams. These shams are made of 100% Egyptian cotton with a breathable, soft sateen weave comparable to those found in 5 star hotels around the globe.

300 Thread Count Egyptian Cotton

Our 300 thread count Egyptian cotton is made with a sateen four over one weave allowing for a silky soft feel. These pillowcases feel smooth and fresh providing the comfort you need for quality nights rest.

Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 200-400 are known for a soft, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton sheets in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. A normal wash cycle with a warm temperature setting is recommended. Quality, pH balanced detergents are best when washing fine cotton linens. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens. Removing cotton sheets promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove sheets while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton sheets. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.
  • 100% Egyptian Cotton - Luxuriously-long Staple Cotton Yarns Make These Pillow Shams Incredibly Soft and Durable
  • STANDARD PILLOW SHAMS – Perfectly fits a 20” x 26” pillow. Confirm pillow size before ordering. Quantity 2
  • LUXURY 100% EGYPTIAN COTTON - Shams with 2” flange on all four sides and overlapping fabric in back for finished look
  • HIGHEST QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Made of 100% combed cotton spun into compact yarns and woven into a 300 thread count fabric. Very rare to use such beautiful yarns for retail sheeting
  • BIO-POLISHED - You’ll feel the fantastic softness at first touch. Sateen weave and MERCERIZED for a beautiful sheen.
  • EASY CARE & PRESHRUNK FOR A PERFECT FIT - Machine wash on cold. Tumble dry on low. Do not use bleach or softeners. Preshrunk for a perfecly snug fit on your pillow, please confirm your pillow size before placing your order.

entry.title: American Pillowcase Sheets & Pillowcases, 100% Percale Egyptian Cotton, 400 Thread Count, Pick One
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 16.98 - 28.72 (7 variants)

American Pillowcase is bringing you their 100% luxury Egyptian Cotton made from long staple yarns. This Percale textile is a classic one-over-one-under weave which makes the fabric cool and crisp to touch. This breathable yet medium weight material keeps you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. High thread count does not mean better quality or comfort, but this 400 count is perfect for maximum comfort and durability. Even for those with sensitive skin. The hypoallergenic qualities will reduce allergens but still showcases a smooth finish for a satin-like surface and luminous sheen. The hems will help prevent falling apart as extra stitches have been added to ensure a long-lasting product.

Includes:1 - 110" x 106" White Flat Sheet

Flat Sheet

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with this American Pillowcase Flat Sheet. This flat sheet is made of 100% Egyptian cotton with a breathable, crisp Percale weave comparable to those found in 5 star hotels around the globe.

400 Thread Count Percale Egyption Cotton

Our percale weave cotton sheets are produced using a one over one under pattern, creating a tight weave that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability.

Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 200-400 are known for a crisp, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture. Percale sheets resist pilling, especially in thread counts of 400 or more. These sheets will develop a softer feel with every washing.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton percale sheets in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. A gentle wash cycle with a cold temperature setting, and a mild detergent is recommended. Quality, pH balanced detergents are best when washing fine cotton linens. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens.

Removing cotton sheets promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove sheets while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton sheets. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.
  • 100% Combed Egyptian Cotton – Hypoallergenic, Luxurious, Soft, Durable
  • KING/CALIFORNIA KING FLAT SHEET - Measuring 110" x 106" and a 4" hem, this flat sheet is generous in size and will provide a smooth transition into a deep sleep. This breathable yet medium weight material keeps you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter.
  • HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - These crisp sheets are made of luxurious 100% Egyptian cotton, beautifully woven in a way to give these sheets a classic, clean look. Double stitching ensures durability for this 400 thread count linen.
  • LIMITED WRINKLES - The classic percale weave is a unique one-over-one-under that makes this fabric cool and crisp to the touch, with a desirable textured look. While it is cotton, some wrinkles may occur but due to the structure this is limited.
  • HYPOALLERGENIC - The hypoallergenic qualities will reduce allergens but still showcases a sateen finish for a smooth, satin-like surface and luminous sheen.
  • MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – American Pillowcase stands behind their products and offers a hassle free, no questions asked return process.

Body Pillow Case

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with these American Pillowcase Body Pillowcases. These pillowcases are made of 100% Egyptian cotton with a breathable, crisp Percale weave comparable to those found in 5 star hotels around the globe.

400 Thread Count Percale Egyption Cotton

Our percale weave cotton pillowcases are produced using a one over one under pattern, creating a tight weave that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability.

Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 200-400 are known for a crisp, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture. Percale sheets resist pilling, especially in thread counts of 400 or more. These sheets will develop a softer feel with every washing.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton percale pillowcases in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens.
